translations: n．令人厌恶，令人讨厌：引起强烈反感或厌恶的特质或行为。
· The loathsomeness of the crime shocked the entire community.
这起罪行的令人厌恶之处震惊了整个社区。

sentences.sentence: God said to Noah, 'The loathsomeness of all mankind has become plain to me, for through them the earth is full of violence.
sentences.translation: 上帝对诺亚说：“人类的可憎我再清楚不过了，他们使这世界充满了仇杀。
